pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of Transition Probabilities for the Illness-Death Model // Estimation of transition probabilities for the illness-death model. Both the Aalen-Johansen estimator for a Markov model and a novel non-Markovian estimator by de Una- Alvarez and Meira-Machado (2015) doi:10.1111/biom.12288, see also Balboa and de Una-Alvarez (2018) doi:10.18637/jss.v083.i10, are included.
